biotools.summary: This tool produces plots enabling the discovery of cross-contamination of samples across the full selection of barcodes used in a sequencing plate. It also filters false barcodes from each batch and retains only the 'real' barcodes.

galaxy.bio_tools_summary: This tool produces plots enabling the discovery of cross-contamination of samples across the full selection of barcodes used in a sequencing plate. It also filters false barcodes from each batch and retains only the 'real' barcodes.
